page.title: 02CHILSWORTHY
page.content:
{CHILSWORTHY
{Chilworthy}is a small village,two miles to the north-west of the market town of Holsworthy.It has a garage that serves petrol and mends cars.Next door is a post office.In the village, there is a church which has a Sunday school.
There is a village hall which is used by the Sunday school for Christmas plays and sometimes used by the youth club.There are some council houses. There isn't a shop in{Chilsworthy}for the nearest shop is at Holsworthy Beacon which is two miles from {Chilsworthy.}
{by Shawn Le-Roy,Richard Griffiths {and David Sillifant.
